reviews.name: MotorCraft Oil Filter,  FL820S
reviews.reviewText: If you own a 5.4L 3 valve V-8, you must use this filter! Motorcraft has a pattented designed check valve inside this filter that other manufacturers cannot copy until the pattent runs out. The check valve keeps oil around the phasers and rocker arms for cold starts. If this oil isn't there, damage will occur to the phasers which will evetually lead to a complete engine failure. If your engine is already making a diesel sound, then damage has already occurred. The repair to mine cost me $2600 at my local dealership. This is a well known problem at the Ford truck forums on-line. Ford should make it known to the owners, but there making too much money to want to change it.
reviews.title: If you own a 5.4L 3 valve V-8, you must use this!

reviews.name: MotorCraft Oil Filter,  FL820S
reviews.reviewText: But WM has a great price on them and they are MUCH better than anything FRAM.
reviews.title: Hey, it's just a freakin' oil filter.

reviews.name: MotorCraft Oil Filter,  FL820S
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend using this OE (Original Equipment) filter for Ford Lincoln Mercury. This is the Original fiter that is in your vehicle when it was brand new. I highly recommend using OE in no matter what kind of auto you have.
reviews.title: MC Oil Filter

reviews.name: MotorCraft Oil Filter,  FL820S
reviews.reviewText: I have a 5.4 motor and I only use this filter, due the issues this motor has.
reviews.title: Fits right, the right part for the vehicle.

reviews.name: MotorCraft Oil Filter,  FL820S
reviews.reviewText: I bought five of these for my Mustang oil changes. Original 2008 Mustang OEM filters. Work great.
reviews.title: Matches my OEM Mustang 2008 filter
